thread.title: TV stars at Walsall Comic Con
thread.title_full: TV stars at Walsall Comic Con

title: TV stars at Walsall Comic Con
text:
Tweet 
A number of guests and more than 50 traders will be at Walsall Town Hall for the event, which takes place on October 31. 
Andrew-Lee Potts from Primeval, Hattie Hayridge from Red Dwarf and Sarah Louise Madison and Simon Fisher Becker from Doctor Who will be signing autographs and talking to fans. 
Lee Bradley, freelance illustrator and Lucasfilm accredited artist, will also talk about the techniques used when creating sequential art. What do you think? Be the first to comment 
Fans will be able to buy merchandise from their favourite anime, manga, TV shows and movies, comics and more. 
Walsall film makers Lightbeam Productions and Pat The Bull Films will give a preview of their new film, The House of Screaming Death. 
Visitors are encouraged to dress up as their favourite characters and can enter a cosplay competition. A retro gaming area will feature games from SEGA and Nintendo consoles, as well as Atari and Intelvision. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
